sudoku.util

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • sudoku.util.StringUtil

  • public final class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility functions for strings.

      • repeat

        public static java.lang.String repeat(java.lang.String in,
                      int n)
        Returns a new string which is the input string repeated n times.
        Parameters:
        in - the string to repeat
        n - the number of times to repeat the string
        Returns:
        the repeated string

      • join

        public static java.lang.String join(java.util.Collection<?> collection,
                    java.lang.String delimeter)
        Folds the collection into a string, putting the delimeter in between each element of the collection. eg join([1,2,3], " ") = "1 2 3"
        Parameters:
        collection - the collection to fold
        delimeter - string to put in between each element of the collection
        Returns:
        the joined collection string
        See Also:
        StringUtil.join(ArrayList, String)

      • join

        public static java.lang.String join(java.util.ArrayList<?> list,
                    java.lang.String delimeter)
        Folds the list into a string, putting the delimeter in between each element of the collection. eg join([1,2,3], " ") = "1 2 3"
        Parameters:
        list - the list to fold
        delimeter - string to put in between each element of the list
        Returns:
        the joined list string

      • join

        public static java.lang.String join(java.lang.Object[] array,
                    java.lang.String delimeter)
        Folds the array into a string, putting the delimeter in between each element of the collection. eg join([1,2,3], " ") = "1 2 3"
        Parameters:
        array - to array to fold
        delimeter - string to put in between each element of the list
        Returns:
        the joined array string

      • padRight

        public static java.lang.String padRight(java.lang.String in,
                        char pad,
                        int length)
        Returns the string, padded with the character to the length specified. The new characters are added to the end (the right) of the input string.
        Parameters:
        in - the string to extend
        pad - the character to add onto the end of the string
        length - how long to make the new string
        Returns:
        the input string padded from the right

      • padLeft

        public static java.lang.String padLeft(java.lang.String in,
                       char pad,
                       int length)
        Returns the string, padded with the character to the length specified. The new characters are added to the start (the left) of the input string.
        Parameters:
        in - the string to extend
        pad - the character to add onto the beginning of the string
        length - how long to make the new string
        Returns:
        the input string padded from the left

      • replaceAll

        public static java.lang.String replaceAll(java.lang.String src,
                          java.lang.String[] replace,
                          java.lang.String[] by)
        Replaces all Strings in replace by the corresponding String in by, that is the ith String in replace is replaced by the ith String in by, in order.
        Parameters:
        src - the string to replace values in
        replace - the substrings to find
        by - what to replace the substrings with
        Returns:
        the replaced string

      • replaceAll

        Replaces all Strings in replace by by.
        Parameters:
        src - the string to replace values in
        replace - the substrings to find
        by - what to replace the substrings with
        Returns:
        the replaced string
